DataElement.preferredName: Associated Persons Domain HLA Mismatch Number CDISC Variable Terminology Outcome
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator for the number of mismatches between donor and subject HLA typing.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Associated Persons Domain HLA Mismatch Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to associated persons._The state when a recipient of a hematopoietic stem cell transplant is not fully matched with their donor for HLA-A, HLA-B, HLA-C, and HLA-DRB1._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
